ValidationRule.description: Is Direct Buyer? YES & Is Direct Seller? is YES then Buyer AML & Seller AML count should be >0
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF(TEXT(Is_Direct_Buyer__c) = "YES" && TEXT(Is_Direct_Seller__c) = "YES" && ISPICKVAL( Status__c , 'Contract Requested') && NOT( RecordType.Name = "UK"), IF( Contract_Buyer_AML_Count__c <= 0 || Seller_AML_Count__c <=0,TRUE,false),false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the Seller and Buyer are direct, AML for Seller and Buyer needs to be requested to proceed with contract request.
